Key Match Events: Dasun Shanaka scored an unbeaten 56 off 22 balls and took 2 wickets for 4 runs.
Axar Patel scored 65 off 31 balls with a strike rate of 209.67.
Shivam Mavi scored 26 off 15 balls with a strike rate of 173.33.
Umran Malik took 3 wickets for 48 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Dasun Shanaka was named Player of the Match.
The series is now level at 1-1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rahul Tripathi made his T20I debut.
The match was held at Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Pune.
